forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Becoming windy. Cloudy skies with periods of rain developing this afternoon. High around 10C. Winds S at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy this morning then becoming windy with rain developing this afternoon. High 52F. Winds S at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy and windy at times with periods of rain. Low 7C. Winds SSW at 40 to 55 km/h, becoming ESE and decreasing to 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach 25mm. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy at times with rain likely. Low 46F. Winds SSW at 25 to 35 mph, becoming E and decreasing to 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over one inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low near 50F. Winds ESE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.
